data.name: Dark Deity Soundtrack
data.detailed_description: The Dark Deity Original Soundtrack features over an hour of orchestral music from Composers Sam Huss and Andy Han, with a bonus piece from Adam Schmieder. Relive the highs and lows of Dark Deity's story through all the tracks from the game, mastered for standalone listening.
data.about_the_game: The Dark Deity Original Soundtrack features over an hour of orchestral music from Composers Sam Huss and Andy Han, with a bonus piece from Adam Schmieder. Relive the highs and lows of Dark Deity's story through all the tracks from the game, mastered for standalone listening.
data.short_description: The full original soundtrack for Dark Deity, featuring 51 beautiful tracks of original music.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 1 GB available space
